segments.text: What are your responsibilities as a secretary ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I did only simple things in the office , such as tidying up the office , serving tea , typing and filing , and so on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What courses did you take in English secretarial studies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I took such courses as Secretarial Principles , Office Administration , Business English , and Public Relations .
segments.speaker: S2
